Plot: A young black woman discovers that her father was a sperm donor, and if that weren't bad enough, he's white.
Title: Made in America
Writer: Marcia Brandwynne (story), Nadine Schiff (story), Holly Goldberg Sloan (story), Holly Goldberg Sloan (screenplay)
Actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Ted Danson, Will Smith, Nia Long
